transcript: I have never made a business plan in my entire life I just know like okay well this cost this much I think I could charge this much let me see if I can let people know about it and if they want to buy it that's it you just sell something to someone and that means you're in business a lot of people really over complicate it it's like you have a service you do something that saves someone time or effort and you charge them a premium on your time in order to do it because you have some skill that they don't or some time that they don't or you have some sort of product that you developed you know what it costs you buy a little bit more in bulk so you save and then you have a markup and you sell it that's all it is
